117  class SL_SCANNING_EXPORT MeshFilterParameters {
118  public:
124  enum FILTER {
125  FILTER_LOW,
126  FILTER_MEDIUM,
127  FILTER_HIGH
128  };
129 
133  MeshFilterParameters(FILTER filtering_ = FILTER_LOW) {
134  set(filtering_);
135  }
136 
141  void set(FILTER filtering_ = FILTER_LOW) {
142  filtering = filtering_;
143  }
144 
145  FILTER filtering = FILTER::FILTER_LOW;
146 
152  bool save(sl::String filename);
153 
159  bool load(sl::String filename);
160  };
